","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"enabled","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenIn","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenOut","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint24","name":"fee","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"uint160","name":"sqrtPriceLimitX96","type":"uint160"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint32","name":"_cooldownSec","type":"uint32"},{"internalType":"uint16","name":"_maxSlippageBps","type":"uint16"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"_allowSwap","type":"bool"}],"name":"setAutomationConfig","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"enabled","type":"bool"}],"name":"setAutomationEnabled","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"enabled","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"uint32","name":"_cooldownSec","type":"uint32"}],"name":"setCompoundConfig","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"enabled","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"uint32","name":"harvestCooldownSec","type":"uint32"}],"name":"setDailyHarvestConfig","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"enabled","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenIn","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenOut","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint24","name":"fee","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"uint160","name":"sqrtPriceLimitX96","type":"uint160"}],"name":"setRewardSwapConfig","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"stake","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"strategyId","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenIn","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenOut","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint24","name":"fee","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amountIn","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amountOutMinimum","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint160","name":"sqrtPriceLimitX96","type":"uint160"}],"name":"swapExactInPancake","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amountOut","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"tokens","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"token0","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"token1","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"unstake","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Security model: - Assets are held in this vault (token0/token1). - CL lifecycle operations (open/rebalance/exit/collect/stake/harvest) are delegated to the adapter. - Only `owner` can perform manual operations and configuration changes. - Only `executor` can call automated routines (rebalance and daily harvest/compound). - No generic \"transfer out\" is provided; funds flow only to:   - adapter (LP operations)   - fixed dexRouter (restricted swaps)   - owner (withdraw paths)   - feeCollector (via adapter protocol fee reporting) Operational design: - Rebalance exits the current position and routes outstanding pool fees (token0/token1) to VaultFeeBuffer   through the adapter (protocol cut may apply). - Gauge rewards are harvested explicitly by the daily routine to avoid high gas on every rebalance. - If the position is staked, the adapter must withdraw the NFT from the gauge to operate; some gauges may   pay pending rewards as a side-effect of withdraw(). In that case, only the reward delta observed during   that operation is credited to this vault in VaultFeeBuffer. - Compounding is executed as a separate job: funds are withdrawn from VaultFeeBuffer to the vault and then   added to the position via adapter.increaseLiquidityFromVault().","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"autoHarvestAndCompoundPancake((bool,bool,bool,uint256,uint256,uint160,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256))":{"details":"Gating rules: - dailyHarvestEnabled/cooldown is enforced ONLY if harvest/swap is executed. - compoundEnabled/cooldown is enforced ONLY if compound is executed. - \"compound_job\" currently sweeps funds from VaultFeeBuffer back to the vault.   The next rebalance will use all idle vault balances to open the new position.   (True on-chain compounding via increaseLiquidity can be enabled later if desired.)"},"autoRebalancePancake((int24,int24,uint24,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint160))":{"details":"- Exits the current position back to the vault principal and routes pool fees to VaultFeeBuffer. - Does not execute an explicit gauge harvest(). If the NFT is staked, the adapter withdraws it from the   gauge; any reward paid as a side-effect of that withdraw is credited as a delta to this vault's buffer."},"claimRewards()":{"details":"Daily routine should prefer adapter.harvestGaugeRewardsToBuffer()."},"constructor":{"params":{"_adapter":"Concentrated liquidity adapter already wired to a pool.","_allowSwap":"Whether automated swaps are allowed.","_cooldownSec":"Initial rebalance cooldown.","_dexRouter":"Fixed DEX router used for swaps.","_executor":"Off-chain automation executor (bot).","_feeCollector":"Protocol fee collector (can be zero if disabled).","_maxSlippageBps":"Initial max slippage (bps).","_owner":"Owner of this vault (fund/DAO/multisig).","_strategyId":"Strategy identifier for reporting / introspection."}},"getAutomationConfig()":{"returns":{"cooldown":"Cooldown in seconds between automated rebalances.","enabled":"Whether rebalance automation is enabled.","slippageBps":"Maximum slippage in basis points.","swapAllowed":"Whether automation swaps are allowed."}},"openInitialPosition(int24,int24)":{"details":"Best-effort stake if adapter supports it."},"positionTokenIdView()":{"returns":{"tokenId":"Current tokenId held by this vault in the adapter (0 if none)."}},"setAutomationConfig(uint32,uint16,bool)":{"params":{"_allowSwap":"Whether automation is allowed to perform swaps.","_cooldownSec":"Minimum time between automated rebalances.","_maxSlippageBps":"Maximum slippage in basis points (informational/off-chain)."}},"setAutomationEnabled(bool)":{"params":{"enabled":"True to enable, false to disable."}},"setCompoundConfig(bool,uint32)":{"details":"This config gates ONLY the compound path (increase liquidity from buffer).","params":{"_cooldownSec":"Minimum seconds between compound runs (0 = no restriction).","enabled":"True to enable compounding."}},"setDailyHarvestConfig(bool,uint32)":{"details":"This config gates ONLY the harvest path (pool fees / gauge rewards / reward swap).","params":{"enabled":"True to enable daily harvest routine.","harvestCooldownSec":"Minimum seconds between harvest runs."}},"setRewardSwapConfig(bool,address,address,uint24,uint160)":{"details":"Prevents swapping arbitrary tokens.","params":{"enabled":"Whether reward swapping is enabled.","fee":"Pancake V3 fee tier.","sqrtPriceLimitX96":"Optional price limit (0 = none).","tokenIn":"Reward token (e.g., CAKE).","tokenOut":"Target token (e.g., USDC)."}},"swapExactInPancake(address,address,uint24,uint256,uint256,uint160)":{"details":"Funds remain in the vault (recipient = address(this))."},"tokens()":{"returns":{"token0":"Address of token0.","token1":"Address of token1."}},"unstake()":{"details":"Unstakes the NFT from the gauge. No explicit harvest() is executed here.      If the gauge pays rewards as a side-effect of withdraw(), the adapter credits only the observed delta      to this vault's fee buffer."}},"title":"ClientVault","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"AutoRebalanced(int24,int24,uint128,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an automated rebalance is executed by the executor."},"AutomationConfigUpdated(uint32,uint16,bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when rebalance automation config is updated."},"AutomationToggled(bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when rebalance automation is toggled."},"Collected(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when fees are collected from the adapter into the vault."},"CompoundConfigUpdated(bool,bool,uint32,uint32)":{"notice":"Emitted when compound config is updated (old/new values)."},"CompoundExecuted(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the compound path completes."},"DailyHarvestConfigUpdated(bool,bool,uint32,uint32)":{"notice":"Emitted when daily-harvest config is updated (old/new values)."},"DailyHarvestExecuted(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the harvest path completes."},"ExitedAndWithdrawn(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the position is exited and all funds are withdrawn to the owner."},"ExitedToVault()":{"notice":"Emitted when the position is exited (funds remain in the vault)."},"ManualRebalanced(int24,int24,uint128)":{"notice":"Emitted when a manual rebalanceWithCaps is executed by the owner."},"PositionOpened(uint256,int24,int24,uint128)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new position is opened."},"RewardSwapConfigUpdated(bool,address,address,uint24,uint160)":{"notice":"Emitted when reward swap config is updated."},"Staked()":{"notice":"Emitted when the position is staked in the underlying gauge/farm."},"Swapped(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a swap via the fixed dexRouter is executed."},"Unstaked()":{"notice":"Emitted when the position is unstaked from the underlying gauge/farm."},"VaultInitialized(address,address,address,address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the vault is created."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"adapter()":{"notice":"Concentrated liquidity adapter (Pancake, Uniswap, Aerodrome, etc.)."},"allowSwap()":{"notice":"Whether automated logic is allowed to execute swaps."},"autoHarvestAndCompoundPancake((bool,bool,bool,uint256,uint256,uint160,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256))":{"notice":"Unified entrypoint for the two scheduled jobs: - harvest_job: set harvest* and/or swapRewards; compound=false - compound_job: set compound=true; harvest*=false; swapRewards=false"},"autoRebalancePancake((int24,int24,uint24,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint160))":{"notice":"Automated rebalance entry point for Pancake V3-style pools."},"automationEnabled()":{"notice":"Whether rebalance automation is enabled for this vault."},"claimRewards()":{"notice":"Claim gauge rewards to the vault (legacy/manual path)."},"collectToVault()":{"notice":"Collect pool fees from the adapter into the vault (idle balances)."},"compoundCooldownSec()":{"notice":"Minimum time (seconds) between compounding calls (0 = no restriction)."},"compoundEnabled()":{"notice":"Whether scheduled compounding is enabled."},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructs a new ClientVault instance."},"cooldownSec()":{"notice":"Minimum time (in seconds) between automated rebalances."},"dailyHarvestCooldownSec()":{"notice":"Minimum seconds between harvest runs (e.g. 86400)."},"dailyHarvestEnabled()":{"notice":"Whether daily harvest routine is enabled."},"dexRouter()":{"notice":"Fixed DEX router used for swaps (no arbitrary routers allowed)."},"executor()":{"notice":"Off-chain automation executor (bot)."},"exitPositionAndWithdrawAll(address)":{"notice":"Exit the position and withdraw all vault balances to `to`."},"exitPositionToVault()":{"notice":"Exit the position, keeping resulting tokens in the vault."},"feeCollector()":{"notice":"Address that will receive protocol performance fees (via adapter protocol reporting)."},"getAutomationConfig()":{"notice":"Returns the current automation configuration."},"lastCompoundTs()":{"notice":"Last successful compound timestamp (only updated if compound path runs)."},"lastDailyHarvestTs()":{"notice":"Last successful harvest timestamp (only updated if harvest path runs)."},"lastRebalanceTs()":{"notice":"Timestamp of the last successful automated rebalance."},"maxSlippageBps()":{"notice":"Maximum allowed slippage in basis points (informational / off-chain enforcement)."},"openInitialPosition(int24,int24)":{"notice":"Opens the initial position using all idle balances in the vault."},"owner()":{"notice":"Owner of this vault (fund/DAO/multisig)."},"positionTokenId()":{"notice":"Last tokenId held by this vault in the adapter (0 if none)."},"positionTokenIdView()":{"notice":"Minimal position tokenId view for off-chain bots/APIs."},"rebalanceWithCaps(int24,int24,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Manual rebalance using caps (advanced owner operation)."},"rewardSwap()":{"notice":"Reward swap configuration (single hop)."},"setAutomationConfig(uint32,uint16,bool)":{"notice":"Update rebalance automation configuration."},"setAutomationEnabled(bool)":{"notice":"Enable or disable rebalance automation for this vault."},"setCompoundConfig(bool,uint32)":{"notice":"Enable/disable scheduled compounding and set its cooldown."},"setDailyHarvestConfig(bool,uint32)":{"notice":"Enable/disable daily harvest routine and set its cooldown."},"setRewardSwapConfig(bool,address,address,uint24,uint160)":{"notice":"Configure a restricted reward swap route (e.g., CAKE -> USDC)."},"stake()":{"notice":"Stake the current introspection."},"swapExactInPancake(address,address,uint24,uint256,uint256,uint160)":{"notice":"Manual swap via the vault's fixed Pancake V3 router."},"tokens()":{"notice":"Returns the pool tokens for this vault's adapter."},"unstake()":{"notice":"Unstake the current position from the underlying gauge/farm (if any)."}},"notice":"Single-user, non-upgradeable vault that holds funds and delegates autoHarvestAndCompoundPancake((bool,bool.details: Gating rules: - dailyHarvestEnabled/cooldown is enforced ONLY if harvest/swap is executed. - compoundEnabled/cooldown is enforced ONLY if compound is executed. - "compound_job" currently sweeps funds from VaultFeeBuffer back to the vault.   The next rebalance will use all idle vault balances to open the new position.   (True on-chain compounding via increaseLiquidity can be enabled later if desired.)

autoRebalancePancake((int24,int24,uint24.details: - Exits the current position back to the vault principal and routes pool fees to VaultFeeBuffer. - Does not execute an explicit gauge harvest(). If the NFT is staked, the adapter withdraws it from the   gauge; any reward paid as a side-effect of that withdraw is credited as a delta to this vault's buffer.

params._adapter: Concentrated liquidity adapter already wired to a pool.
params._dexRouter: Fixed DEX router used for swaps.
params._feeCollector: Protocol fee collector (can be zero if disabled).

returns.cooldown: Cooldown in seconds between automated rebalances.

openInitialPosition(int24,int24).details: Best-effort stake if adapter supports it.

returns.tokenId: Current tokenId held by this vault in the adapter (0 if none).

params._allowSwap: Whether automation is allowed to perform swaps.

params.enabled: True to enable, false to disable.

setCompoundConfig(bool,uint32).details: This config gates ONLY the compound path (increase liquidity from buffer).

params._cooldownSec: Minimum seconds between compound runs (0 = no restriction).

setDailyHarvestConfig(bool,uint32).details: This config gates ONLY the harvest path (pool fees / gauge rewards / reward swap).

params.enabled: True to enable daily harvest routine.

swapExactInPancake(address,address,uint2.details: Funds remain in the vault (recipient = address(this)).

unstake().details: Unstakes the NFT from the gauge. No explicit harvest() is executed here.      If the gauge pays rewards as a side-effect of withdraw(), the adapter credits only the observed delta      to this vault's fee buffer.

adapter().notice: Concentrated liquidity adapter (Pancake, Uniswap, Aerodrome, etc.).

allowSwap().notice: Whether automated logic is allowed to execute swaps.

autoHarvestAndCompoundPancake((bool,bool.notice: Unified entrypoint for the two scheduled jobs: - harvest_job: set harvest* and/or swapRewards; compound=false - compound_job: set compound=true; harvest*=false; swapRewards=false

autoRebalancePancake((int24,int24,uint24.notice: Automated rebalance entry point for Pancake V3-style pools.

automationEnabled().notice: Whether rebalance automation is enabled for this vault.

claimRewards().notice: Claim gauge rewards to the vault (legacy/manual path).

collectToVault().notice: Collect pool fees from the adapter into the vault (idle balances).

compoundCooldownSec().notice: Minimum time (seconds) between compounding calls (0 = no restriction).

cooldownSec().notice: Minimum time (in seconds) between automated rebalances.

dailyHarvestEnabled().notice: Whether daily harvest routine is enabled.

dexRouter().notice: Fixed DEX router used for swaps (no arbitrary routers allowed).

exitPositionAndWithdrawAll(address).notice: Exit the position and withdraw all vault balances to `to`.

exitPositionToVault().notice: Exit the position, keeping resulting tokens in the vault.

feeCollector().notice: Address that will receive protocol performance fees (via adapter protocol reporting).

lastCompoundTs().notice: Last successful compound timestamp (only updated if compound path runs).

lastDailyHarvestTs().notice: Last successful harvest timestamp (only updated if harvest path runs).

lastRebalanceTs().notice: Timestamp of the last successful automated rebalance.

maxSlippageBps().notice: Maximum allowed slippage in basis points (informational / off-chain enforcement).

openInitialPosition(int24,int24).notice: Opens the initial position using all idle balances in the vault.

positionTokenId().notice: Last tokenId held by this vault in the adapter (0 if none).

positionTokenIdView().notice: Minimal position tokenId view for off-chain bots/APIs.

rebalanceWithCaps(int24,int24,uint256,ui.notice: Manual rebalance using caps (advanced owner operation).

setAutomationEnabled(bool).notice: Enable or disable rebalance automation for this vault.

setCompoundConfig(bool,uint32).notice: Enable/disable scheduled compounding and set its cooldown.

setDailyHarvestConfig(bool,uint32).notice: Enable/disable daily harvest routine and set its cooldown.

setRewardSwapConfig(bool,address,address.notice: Configure a restricted reward swap route (e.g., CAKE -> USDC).

stake().notice: Stake the current position in the underlying gauge/farm (if any).

strategyId().notice: Strategy identifier used for protocol reporting / introspection.

swapExactInPancake(address,address,uint2.notice: Manual swap via the vault's fixed Pancake V3 router.

tokens().notice: Returns the pool tokens for this vault's adapter.

unstake().notice: Unstake the current position from the underlying gauge/farm (if any).
